content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/sonar-alloweddependencies-plugin is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

The migration steps typically include:
1. Exploring the project structure
2. Checking the current pom.xml configuration
3. Updating Java version in pom.xml
4. Checking for deprecated APIs or incompatible code
5. Running mvn clean verify to ensure everything works
6. Fixing any issues that arise

Let me start by examining the repository structure.

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.devwithimagination</groupId>
    <artifactId>sonar-alloweddependencies-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>MIT</name>
            <url>https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html</url>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <!-- this is important for sonar-packaging-maven-plugin -->
    <packaging>sonar-plugin</packaging>

    <description>Plugin for scanning projects against an approved dependency list</description>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <java.version>8</java.version>
        <sonar.sources>src/main/java,pom.xml</sonar.sources>

        <sonar.projectKey>dhutchison_sonar-alloweddependencies-plugin</sonar.projectKey>
        <sonar.organization>dhutchison</sonar.organization>
        <sonar.host.url>https://sonarcloud.io</sonar.host.url>
    </properties>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.junit</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit-bom</artifactId>
                <version>5.7.1</version>
                <scope>import</scope>
                <type>pom</type>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <dependencies>
        <!-- Core Sonarqube plugin API -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.sonarsource.sonarqube</groupId>
            <artifactId>sonar-plugin-api</artifactId>
            <!-- minimal version of SonarQube to support. -->
            <version>7.9.5</version>
            <!-- mandatory scope -->
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>

        <!-- Common analyser utilities -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.sonarsource.analyzer-commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>sonar-xml-parsing</artifactId>
            <version>1.12.0.632</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- JSON parser library -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.json</artifactId>
            <version>1.1.4</version>
        </dependency>


        <!-- Test components -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-params</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>3.8.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.8.1</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <source>${java.version}</source>
                        <target>${java.version}</target>
                        <!--<release>${java.version}</release>-->
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                    <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>0.8.6</version>

                    <executions>

                        <execution>
                            <!--
                                Prepares the property pointing to the JaCoCo runtime agent which
                                is passed as VM argument when Maven the Surefire plugin is executed.
                            -->
                            <id>pre-unit-test</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <!-- Sets the path to the file which contains the execution data. -->
                                <destFile>${project.build.directory}/coverage-reports/jacoco-ut.exec</destFile>
                                <!--
                                    Sets the name of the property containing the settings
                                    for JaCoCo runtime agent.
                                -->
                                <propertyName>surefireArgLine</propertyName>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>
                        <execution>
                            <!--
                                Ensures that the code coverage report for unit tests is created after
                                unit tests have been run.
                            -->
                            <id>post-unit-test</id>
                            <phase>test</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>report</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <!-- Sets the path to the file which contains the execution data. -->
                                <dataFile>${project.build.directory}/coverage-reports/jacoco-ut.exec</dataFile>
                                <!-- Sets the output directory for the code coverage report. -->
                                <outputDirectory>${project.reporting.outputDirectory}/jacoco-ut</outputDirectory>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>

                    </executions>
                    <configuration>
                        <propertyName>jacoco.agent.argLine</propertyName>
                        <skip>false</skip>
                        <append>true</append>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M5</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <!-- Sets the VM argument line used when unit tests are run. -->
                        <argLine>${surefireArgLine}</argLine>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>

        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonarsource.sonar-packaging-maven-plugin</groupId>
                <artifactId>sonar-packaging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.18.0.372</version>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <!-- the entry-point class that extends org.sonar.api.SonarPlugin -->
                    <pluginClass>com.devwithimagination.sonar.alloweddependencies.AllowedDependenciesPlugin</pluginClass>

                    <!-- advanced properties can be set here. See paragraph "Advanced Build Properties". -->
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

    </build>
</project>

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.devwithimagination</groupId>
    <artifactId>sonar-alloweddependencies-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>MIT</name>
            <url>https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html</url>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <!-- this is important for sonar-packaging-maven-plugin -->
    <packaging>sonar-plugin</packaging>

    <description>Plugin for scanning projects against an approved dependency list</description>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <java.version>17</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
        <maven.compiler.release>17</maven.compiler.release>
        <sonar.sources>src/main/java,pom.xml</sonar.sources>

        <sonar.projectKey>dhutchison_sonar-alloweddependencies-plugin</sonar.projectKey>
        <sonar.organization>dhutchison</sonar.organization>
        <sonar.host.url>https://sonarcloud.io</sonar.host.url>
    </properties>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.junit</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit-bom</artifactId>
                <version>5.10.2</version>
                <scope>import</scope>
                <type>pom</type>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <dependencies>
        <!-- Core Sonarqube plugin API -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.sonarsource.sonarqube</groupId>
            <artifactId>sonar-plugin-api</artifactId>
            <!-- minimal version of SonarQube to support. -->
            <version>7.9.5</version>
            <!-- mandatory scope -->
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>

        <!-- Common analyser utilities -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.sonarsource.analyzer-commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>sonar-xml-parsing</artifactId>
            <version>1.12.0.632</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- JSON parser library -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.json</artifactId>
            <version>1.1.4</version>
        </dependency>


        <!-- Test components -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-params</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>5.11.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.11.0</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <release>${java.version}</release>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                    <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>0.8.11</version>

                    <executions>

                        <execution>
                            <!--
                                Prepares the property pointing to the JaCoCo runtime agent which
                                is passed as VM argument when Maven the Surefire plugin is executed.
                            -->
                            <id>pre-unit-test</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <!-- Sets the path to the file which contains the execution data. -->
                                <destFile>${project.build.directory}/coverage-reports/jacoco-ut.exec</destFile>
                                <!--
                                    Sets the name of the property containing the settings
                                    for JaCoCo runtime agent.
                                -->
                                <propertyName>surefireArgLine</propertyName>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>
                        <execution>
                            <!--
                                Ensures that the code coverage report for unit tests is created after
                                unit tests have been run.
                            -->
                            <id>post-unit-test</id>
                            <phase>test</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>report</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <!-- Sets the path to the file which contains the execution data. -->
                                <dataFile>${project.build.directory}/coverage-reports/jacoco-ut.exec</dataFile>
                                <!-- Sets the output directory for the code coverage report. -->
                                <outputDirectory>${project.reporting.outputDirectory}/jacoco-ut</outputDirectory>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>

                    </executions>
                    <configuration>
                        <propertyName>jacoco.agent.argLine</propertyName>
                        <skip>false</skip>
                        <append>true</append>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.2.5</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <!-- Sets the VM argument line used when unit tests are run. -->
                        <argLine>${surefireArgLine}</argLine>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>

        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonarsource.sonar-packaging-maven-plugin</groupId>
                <artifactId>sonar-packaging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.18.0.372</version>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <!-- the entry-point class that extends org.sonar.api.SonarPlugin -->
                    <pluginClass>com.devwithimagination.sonar.alloweddependencies.AllowedDependenciesPlugin</pluginClass>

                    <!-- advanced properties can be set here. See paragraph "Advanced Build Properties". -->
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

    </build>
</project>
